system.description:
Also at 2nd level, you have learned that your wild shape can be far more dangerous if you shift into that which is infected or dead. Whenever you Wild Shape into a creature, you gain the zombie template. Furthermore, while in your Wild Shape form, your natural attacks deal an additional amount of necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Lastly, if you use your Wild Shape feature to cast Find Familiar, you may instead choose the familiar to be undead, rather than fey.
